title: A RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS (MGLB) THROUGH THE LOCAL CHIEF EXECUTIVE HONORABLE MAYOR NEIL ANDREW N. NOCON TO ENTER INTO AGREEMENT WITH THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE-LOS BANOS MUNICIPAL POLICE STATION FOR THE INTEGRATION AND CONNECTIVITY OF CCTV CAMERAS LOCATED IN THE PUBLIC SPACES, GOVERNMENT FACILITIES, TRANSPORT TERMINALS, COMMERCIAL ZONES AND/OTHER HIGH TRAFFIC AREAS WITHIN THE JURISDICTION OF THE MUNICIPALITY AND RATIFYING THE SAME. ann aa mg ennn nee me uoe mme eene aa Councilor Benedicto S. Alborida
